entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Light snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
